review: It doesn't work.... My worst purchase from Amazon. Setup works fine but nothing is transmitted to TV.
author: K. Imre

review: Love the Chromecast, use it on my bedroom tv so I can cast from my tablet.  Love being able to cast from plex or netflix.
author: Allen Marshall

review: Best idea we've had in a long time. Makes a great ease of watching Netflix and other videos online. No more HDMI cable mess, sync is perfect. Can be used with amazon instant video if you set your prime preferences to play with the flash player. Then you can cast the tab and avoid any audio/video sync issues.
author: Zac

review: Pice of sh*t, worked perfect ADN suddenly netflix stopped casting
author: juan diego hoyos
